tit.cmt: 英語の訳をタイトルに使用しました。

sen.j: 『俊頼髄脳』（としよりずいのう）は、源俊頼によって書かれた歌論書。
sen.e: "Toshiyori Zuino" is a book of poetics written by MINAMOTO no Toshiyori.
"Toshiyori Zuino" is a book with essays on tanka poetry written by MINAMOTO no Toshiyori.
sen.cmt: 歌論: essay on tanka poetry;
sen.e: "Toshiyori Zuino" (Toshiyori's Poetic Essentials) is a book with essays on tanka poetry written by MINAMOTO no Toshiyori.
sen.cmt: 文頭を一部補足しました。

sen.j: 1113年成立と考えられている。別名『俊頼口伝』『俊秘抄』。
sen.e: Completed in 1113, it is also called "Toshiyori Kuden" and "Shunbisho."
sen.cmt: combined with the sentence below to reduce fragmentation
sen.e: Considered to have been completed in 1113, it is also called "Toshiyori Kuden" and "Shunbisho."

sen.j: 藤原忠実の依頼によって、忠実の姫君のために書かれた作歌の手引書である。
sen.e: Commissioned by FUJIWARA no Tadazane, the Toshiyori's Poetic Essentials was written for his daughter. It is a guidebook on poetic composition.
Commissioned by FUJIWARA no Tadazane, "Toshiyori's Poetic Essentials" was written for Toshiyori's daughter as a guidebook on poetic composition.
sen.cmt: "his" is ambigous in this case, so I changed it to "Toshiyori's"; fixed grammar to read as one sentence instead of two
sen.e: Commissioned by FUJIWARA no Tadazane, it was written for Toshiyori's daughter as a guidebook on poetic composition.
sen.cmt: it was written としました。

sen.j: 説話色が濃く、構成に一貫性はないものの、和歌の故事などが詳しく記されている。
sen.e: It provides detailed accounts of how waka poems were created though it reads like a collection of anecdotes without structural coherence.
